## pow() function

Computes \_A^n\_ recursively.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pow<S>(A: Matrix<S>, n: number): Matrix<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  A | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> | The matrix to raise to a power <code>n</code> |
|  n | <code>number</code> | The power to which to raise <code>A</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix<S>`
